snippet: Scott Dann's stoppage-time header earned Crystal Palace a 1-1 draw with Bournemouth in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: Dann's Late Header Earns Palace Draw With Bournemouth
headline.print_headline: Dann's Late Header Earns Palace Draw With Bournemouth

lead_paragraph: Scott Dann's stoppage-time header earned Crystal Palace a 1-1 draw with Bournemouth in the Premier League on Saturday.

snippet: The Real Madrid playmaker James Rodríguez was caught by the police driving about 125 miles per hour on his way to a training session....
abstract: Real Madrid midfielder James Rodriguez faces large fine after his arrest for driving 125 miles per hour in 75 mph zone; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Real Madrid playmaker James Rodríguez was caught by the police driving about 125 miles per hour on his way to a training session.

snippet: West Bromwich Albion have agreed to sell the club to Yunyi Guokai (Shanghai) Sports Development Ltd, controlled by businessman Guochuan Lai, in the latest instance of China's growing interest in football worldwide....

headline.main: West Brom Agree to Sell Club to Chinese Investment Group
headline.print_headline: West Brom Agree to Sell Club to Chinese Investment Group

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion have agreed to sell the club to Yunyi Guokai (Shanghai) Sports Development Ltd, controlled by businessman Guochuan Lai, in the latest instance of China's growing interest in football worldwide.

snippet: A controlled explosion was carried out on a suspect package in Manchester United's Old Trafford ground on Sunday, police said....

headline.main: Bomb Disposal Team Carry Out Controlled Explosion at Man Utd Stadium
headline.print_headline: Bomb Disposal Team Carry Out Controlled Explosion at Man Utd Stadium

lead_paragraph: A controlled explosion was carried out on a suspect package in Manchester United's Old Trafford ground on Sunday, police said.

snippet: Hull City's interim manager Mike Phelan has been offered a permanent job with the Premier League club but is yet to decide whether to accept....

headline.main: Phelan Considering Contract Offer From Hull
headline.print_headline: Phelan Considering Contract Offer From Hull

lead_paragraph: Hull City's interim manager Mike Phelan has been offered a permanent job with the Premier League club but is yet to decide whether to accept.

snippet: Brazilian midfielder Kenedy has joined Watford on loan from Premier League rivals Chelsea for the rest of the season, the Vicarage Road club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Brazilian Kenedy Joins Watford on Loan From Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Brazilian Kenedy Joins Watford on Loan From Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Brazilian midfielder Kenedy has joined Watford on loan from Premier League rivals Chelsea for the rest of the season, the Vicarage Road club said on Tuesday.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur's Belgium defender Jan Vertonghen has signed a new contract that runs until 2019, the Premier League club announced on Friday....

headline.main: Spurs Defender Vertonghen Signs New Three-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Spurs Defender Vertonghen Signs New Three-Year Deal

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur's Belgium defender Jan Vertonghen has signed a new contract that runs until 2019, the Premier League club announced on Friday.

snippet: Struggling Swansea City slumped to a third consecutive loss as West Ham United moved well clear of the Premier League relegation zone with a comfortable 4-1 victory at the Liberty Stadium on Monday....

headline.main: Swansea Crushed at Home by West Ham
headline.print_headline: Swansea Crushed at Home by West Ham

lead_paragraph: Struggling Swansea City slumped to a third consecutive loss as West Ham United moved well clear of the Premier League relegation zone with a comfortable 4-1 victory at the Liberty Stadium on Monday.

snippet: Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero will serve a four-match ban for violent conduct, the English Football Association (FA) said on Monday....

headline.main: Man City's Aguero Gets Four-Match Ban for Violent Conduct
headline.print_headline: Man City's Aguero Gets Four-Match Ban for Violent Conduct

lead_paragraph: Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero will serve a four-match ban for violent conduct, the English Football Association (FA) said on Monday.

snippet: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe said Southampton were deserved 3-1 winners of the south-coast Premier League derby on Sunday, suggesting that his own team fell below normal standards for one of their biggest games of the season....

headline.main: Howe Says Saints Were Deserved Winners
headline.print_headline: Howe Says Saints Were Deserved Winners

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe said Southampton were deserved 3-1 winners of the south-coast Premier League derby on Sunday, suggesting that his own team fell below normal standards for one of their biggest games of the season.
